name: Space Lazors
description:
Space Lazors was originally developed for Android and ported to Web.

Fly through the depths of space on a mission to rid the universe of evil! Relentless as they are you must keep fighting as the enemy surge descend upon you wave after wave. Collect shield and weapon upgrades to help you complete your mission. 

Controls: 
Move left and right using the A and D keys or the Left and Right arrow keys on your keyboard. 

Have fun! :D
